title: Substitute
text: Since we know $$d=510$$ and $$r=60$$, we can substitute $$510$$ for $$d$$ and $$60$$ for $$r$$ into the equation, which gives us $$510=60t$$.
speech: Since we know  d is equal to 510  and  r, is equal to 60 , we can substitute  510  for  d  and  60  for  r  into the equation, which gives us  510 is equal to 60 t .

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$t$$, we can divide both sides by $$60$$.
